title: Ultra High Grade Tobacco Type Cards Wanted

posts.post_title: Ultra High Grade Tobacco Type Cards Wanted
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind



We are actively seeking to acquire an ultra high grade example of the following cards
These cards have been on our Want List since 2002

T 208   SGC 60  PSA 5 and above
T 209 Color Only  SGC 84 / PSA 7 and above
T 216    SGC 60 PSA 5 and above
T 227    SGC 80/ PSA 6 and above

Should you have any of these cards for sale or trade, please write in strict confidence

We also are interested in adding to our  T204 collection of PSA 8 examples.

With all good wishes


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List
